FIRST [OFFICIAL] DAY OF SPRING BREAK!

So tonight steff and sam come over and we had an adventure. First we went to little cesears to get yummy pizza. Then we went to McDonald's. It was really cold out so we had to call Kurt's mom to come and get us and take us home. Kurt came with us. We hung out at home for a while then walked to Donny's.

 So right after that we went over to the broken down Amaco station. Despite the cold weather we had a blast. We were all leaning up again the glass wall and i thoungt id't be a grand idea to sndwich sam in between me and the glass wall. Wasn't such a grand idea at all. The window broke....we ran away. Then came back and hung our for another hour or so. YES I FUCKING BROKE THE BIG AMACO WINDOW! YEP THAT WAS ME...MARA YOU KNOW!

 It was getting really cold so we had to go home. Sam stole Tim's sk8board and booked ass home. He eventually cought up eith her and her punishment for stealing his sk8board was to hump him for five minutes. It was more than fantastic. Truly. So then we walked home and hung out...basicly. THen we went online and sent gay porn to these guys. ;) What a night. Can't wait for tomorrow.

so kurts at my house...and this is what happened:

mara-omg tell that guy to go suck his moms chode...lil pussy licker.

sam-no that's mean!

kurt-why would he suck his moms chode if hes a pussy licker?

 

lmao. kay...maybe its not as funny now as it was before...lol o well. you had to be there.

 

xomarley

yey! the kalahari trips in two days! im so excited for spring break. i need it. badly. some spring break...we have fucking snow!

My new favorite band is that black crowes kaythanks. just thought you needed to know that useless information. im bored...and cold ::sigh::

^but my all time favorite song is still "comin home" by lynyrd skynard. yeah yeah, leave me alone. i grew up on classics: bob seger, tom petty, lynyrd skynard...shut up!

 

My angels, my devils, my thorn in my pride.

Are you wanting inspiration
You spill your secrets on me
Then you tell me with a whisper
Of things that will never be.
Do you hear me breathing?
Does it make you want to scream?
Did you ever like a bad dream?
Sometimes life is obscene.

My angels, my devils, my thorn in my pride.

Lover cover me with your sleep
Let your love light shine
Lover cover me with a good dream
Let your love light shine

 

i really really love how everyone in the universe is going somewhere warm for spring break and me and sam are going snowboarding... yes, i love snowboarding with all my heart, but theres a time in ones life when you really crave that tropical sun---if you know what i mean. blahhhhhh.

 

you know you love me

xomarley

wow. so today i woke up at like noon. then i called sam. yes, sam. so we walked to little cesears to get one of their world famous five-dollar pizzas.so after that we decided to go to the bp gas station because justin was working. (keep in mind we're walking with the pizza box in our hands and people are staring at us) so we get to the gas station and i buy a cherry coke and starburst. sam gets a mountain dew. oh, and before we left we gave justin 3 pieces of our pizza, because were nice. then we went to duncans and i got the chocolate neccos and sam couldnt get nething because she has thriteen cents. thats right, thirteen cents. <-<---god i love that kid.

So then we went over to johnny's house. he was grounded so we sat outside his window til we couldnt feel our asses then went to sun laundry, where we sat there for an hour. So, here we are in sun laundry. im eating my chocolate neccos and their powdery. sam decides not to tell me that i have white powder all over my face so all the people in there were staring at me because i look like a coke dealer. Moving on! So me and sam went to MY ID for like ten minutes then started the long trek home. Oh yeah i got a blister from my god damn coach shoes.

So we get home then we go downstairs and go on the computer. Sam decides to put some chap stick on. pardon me, alot of chap stick on. so shes sititng there putting on this  flava-craze for like twenty minutes. no lie. so she finally gets done with moisturizing her lips then she declares that her lips are burning so she grabs a piece of paperand  scrapes her lips for like ten minutes. keep in mind im staring at her like shes licking a frog. she turns to me and says, "what? youve never done this before!?" and i repley, "no, samantha, i have not" <<<---once again, a priceless moment brought to you by samantha bubb. loves it.

 

so, me and sam were looking at marie's profiel and it said: its not always rainvows and butterflies its compromising that moves us along. so i ask sam what song is that? and she goes, "oh ya know that avril lavigne song?" then she starts singing, " nobody home, broken yeah inside!" I just look at her with my eyebrows up, then laugh till it hurts.

^uhhh sam. that was maroon5. ill give ya point for effort.

 

"mara, am i a holla back girl? please say no." <your killing me, sam, killing me.

"i got these from my grandma wally. they smelt like crap when i got em so my mom washed em and then put them in my room." <tallking about sams pink fuzzy cotton candy socks.

Whoa. I just realized this whole entry was a tribute to Samantha Jennifer Bubb. Long live the Queen. ;)

 

xomarley

Never say forever.. Because forever makes me cry...
